member.name: T:PasswordProtector.PasswordProtectAttribute
member.summary: Use this attribute on any string field type to show password text to hide the actual value.

member.name: F:PasswordProtector.PasswordProtectAttribute.enableVisibility
member.summary: Enables a checkbox to show the obscured text.

member.name: P:PasswordProtector.PasswordProtectAttribute.IsVisibile
member.summary: Show the actual value of the password or hide it.

member.name: M:PasswordProtector.PasswordProtectAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor to show password text to hide the actual value.
member.param: Enables a checkbox to show the obscured text.
